channel.title: CVE Feed for Revmakx -- Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Revmakx -- Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule

item.title: CVE-2024-38770|2024-08-07T18:20:36.779Z -- revmakx -- backup%20and%20staging%20by%20wp%20time%20capsule
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Revmakx Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule allows Privilege Escalation, Authentication Bypass.This issue affects Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule: from n/a through 1.22.20.
